Jesus is the Lord of life: Trust Him
Jesus is the Sheperd: Depend on Him
Jesus is the Light: Come and See
In peace I will both lie down and sleep, for You alone, O Lord, make me dwell in safety.
My sheep hear My voice, and I know them, and they follow Me.
He is the Light of the world, Whoever follows Him will never fall into the darkness for Jesus the Light of Life is with them always.
